ygData.subject: Re: Where to go?
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to North Desert of Ro.  Lots of stuff there to keep you busy, also check Oasis.  Or try Misty Thicket, it has goblins, orcs, spiders, young kodiaks, lots of
ygData.messageBody:
Go to North Desert of Ro. Lots of stuff there to keep you busy, also check
Oasis. Or try Misty Thicket, it has goblins, orcs, spiders, young kodiaks,
lots of things that will keep you busy up thru around 14th level.

Or you could even go back to Crushbone, at 12th level except for the royal
party you should be able to take down most orcs as long as you have a medium
sized party.

I went back at 16th level and totally controlled the whole dungeon (minus
Dvinn), with a party tho, we killed Dvinn 8 times.

Wenaddar Bard of Cazic Thule


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tanthalias [SMTP:tanthalas@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 7:29 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Where to go?
>
> I just reached level 12, and now the things I used to hunt in Steamfront
> all con green. Where should I go from here? I could stay here and kill
> mino's, but they're too hard to find (camped most of the time). Where
> should I go from here? What's good for level 12? Any help is greatly
> appreciated.
>
> Tanthalias
> Half Elven Bard, 12th Circle
> Tarew Marr
